title: Joey's Dentist Visit
story: I am taking you to the dentist today. Oh, no. Do I have to go, mom? Don't worry, Joey. Going to the dentist hurts, mom. This is just a checkup. What is a checkup? It's to see if your teeth are okay. That's not so bad.
summary: Joey's mom takes him to the dentist for a checkup and he learns that it's not as scary as he thought.
image: An illustration of Joey sitting in a dentist's chair with a dentist and dental tools around him.
